description: Loans from Michigan’s only green bank Michigan Saves available via partnership with The Kresge Foundation A new program from Michigan Saves will help low-to-moderate income Detroiters and nonprofit organizations more easily access financing to update aging electrical systems to greener, cleaner and more cost-effective technologies.
